TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BulletedList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class BulletedList Inherits ListControl Implements IPostBackEventHandler
type BulletedList = class inherit ListControl interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 创建以项目符号格式生成项列表的控件。

span.span: Creates a control that generates a list of items in a bulleted format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件创建带有项目符号项设置了格式的列表。Use the control to create a list of items that are formatted with bullets. 指定要在中显示的各列表项控件，将放置对象的开始和结束标记之间的每个条目控件。To specify the individual list items that you want to appear in a control, place a object for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 若要指定要用于显示列表项中的项目符号类型控件，将属性设置为项目符号的一个类型由定义枚举。To specify the bullet type to use to display list items in a control, set the property to one of the bullet types that are defined by the enumeration. 下表列出了可用的项目符号样式。The following table lists the available bullet styles. |项目符号样式Bullet style|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||未设置。Not set.| ||数字。A number.| ||小写字母。A lowercase letter.| ||大写字母。An uppercase letter.| ||小写罗马数字。A lowercase Roman numeral.| ||大写罗马数字。An uppercase Roman numeral.| ||实心的圆。A filled circle.| ||空心圆。An empty circle.| ||实心的方形。A filled square.| ||自定义映像。A custom image.| 使用属性指定开始编号的列表项中有序值控件。Use the property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control. 分配给的值忽略属性，如果属性设置为， ， ，或字段。The value that is assigned to the property is ignored, if the property is set to the , , , or field. 如果您设置属性的值若要指定项目符号的自定义映像，必须设置属性还可以指定图像文件的位置。If you set the property to the value of to specify a custom image for the bullet, you must set the property also to specify the location of the image file. 若要指定列表项中的显示行为，将属性设置为定义的值之一枚举。To specify the display behavior of the list items in a , set the property to one of the values that are defined by the enumeration. 定义的显示行为都， ，和。The defined display behaviors are , , and . 单击超链接时，它定位到的 URL。When a hyperlink is clicked, it navigates to a URL. 使用属性指定超链接导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to. 使用属性指定的框架或窗口，其中显示时单击的超链接导航到的网页。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is navigated to when a hyperlink is clicked. 当属性设置为，则控件作为回发到服务器时单击的链接将显示列表项。When the property is set to , the control displays list items as links that post back to the server when clicked. 若要以编程方式控制单击链接按钮时执行的操作，提供的事件处理程序事件。To programmatically control the actions that are performed when a link button is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 请注意，并属性继承自类，并不适用于控件。Note that the and properties are inherited from the class and are not applicable to the control. 使用事件数据的类来确定索引中的链接按钮被单击。Use the event data of the class to determine the index of the link button in a that was clicked. 控件还支持数据绑定。The control also supports data binding. 若要将绑定到数据源，可以使用任何提供的数据绑定机制。To bind the to a data source, you can use any of the provided data-binding mechanisms. 有关详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，此控件呈现的标记可能不符合可访问性标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级为 1 指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建与列表项的格式为链接按钮的控件。The first code example demonstrates how to create a control with list items that are formatted as link buttons. 第二个代码示例演示如何创建控制使用数据绑定来指定列表项。The second code example demonstrates how to create a control using data binding to specify the list items. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建与列表项的格式为链接按钮的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control with list items that are formatted as link buttons. 文本显示在控制单击列表项时。Text is displayed in a control when a list item is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassExample/CS/bulletedlistclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassExample/VB/bulletedlistclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控制使用数据绑定来指定列表项。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control using data binding to specify the list items. 列表项的格式为链接按钮。The list items are formatted as link buttons. 文本显示在控制单击列表项时。Text is displayed in a control when a list item is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClassDataBindExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassDataBindExample/CS/bulletedlistclass2databindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClassDataBindExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassDataBindExample/VB/bulletedlistclass2databindvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为 控件中的每个项目符号显示的图像的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an image to display for each bullet in a control.

value.span: 中显示为每个项目符号的图像的路径。

span.span: The path to an image to display as each bullet in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要显示在为每个项目符号的图像的路径控件。Use the property to specify the path to an image to display as each bullet in a control. 若要指定自定义映像为项目符号，则还必须设置属性的值。To specify a custom image for the bullets, you must also set the property to the value . > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持属性因为项目符号是本质上是装饰性，不提供需要传达通过辅助技术的其他信息。The control does not support the property because the bullets are inherently decorative and do not provide additional information that needs to be conveyed via assistive technology. 但是，如果你想要使用自定义映像来传达给用户的概念，应将其他文本添加到每个项目符号列表项或使用控件，您可以指定每个图像替换文字。However, if you want to use a custom image to convey a concept to the user, you should add additional text to each of the bulleted list items or use a control that allows you to specify alternate text for each image. 您可以指定相对或绝对路径到映像。You can specify either a relative or an absolute path to the image. 相对路径与到 Web 页的位置的映像的位置而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative path relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 该路径是相对于网页上的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这使得更轻松地将整个站点到另一个目录移动服务器上，而不更新代码。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the code. 下面的代码示例显示的图像文件的相对路径：The following code example shows a relative path to an image file: ```csharp \\Images\\image1.jpg ``` ```vb "Images\image1.jpg" ``` 下面的代码示例显示了为图像文件的绝对路径：The following code example shows an absolute path to an image file: ```csharp "c:\\MyImagesDir\\image1.jpg" ``` ```vb "c"\MyImagesDir\image1.jpg" ``` 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件，并设置属性来指定要用于每个项目符号的自定义图像的路径。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property to specify the path to a custom image to use for each bullet. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListBulletImageurl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListBulletImageUrl/CS/bulletimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListBulletImageurl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListBulletImageUrl/VB/bulletimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的项目符号样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the bullet style for the control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要将应用的列表项中的项目符号样式控件。Use the property to specify the bullet style to apply to the list items in a control. 属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |项目符号样式Bullet style|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||未设置。Not set.| ||数字。A number.| ||小写字母。A lowercase letter.| ||大写字母。An uppercase letter.| ||小写罗马数字。A lowercase Roman numeral.| ||大写罗马数字。An uppercase Roman numeral.| ||实心的圆。A filled circle.| ||空心圆。An empty circle.| ||实心的方形。A filled square.| ||自定义映像。A custom image.| 指定值可用于提供您自己的项目符号的图像。Specifying the value allows you to supply your own image for the bullet. 如果指定值，则还必须设置属性设置为要使用自定义映像的 URL。If you specify the value, you must also set the property to the URL of the custom image to use. > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持属性因为项目符号是本质上是装饰性，不提供需要传达通过辅助技术的其他信息。The control does not support the property because the bullets are inherently decorative and do not provide additional information that needs to be conveyed via assistive technology. 但是，如果你想要使用自定义映像来传达给用户的概念，应将其他文本添加到每个项目符号列表项或使用控件，您可以指定每个图像替换文字。However, if you want to use a custom image to convey a concept to the user, you should add additional text to each of the bulleted list items or use a control that allows you to specify alternate text for each image. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control. 一个控件中填充所有可用枚举值。A control is populated with all the available enumeration values. 项目符号样式更改基于用户选择从列表框的样式。The bullet style changes based on the style that the user selects from the list box. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListStylesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListStylesExample/CS/bulletedliststylescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListStylesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListStylesExample/VB/bulletedliststylesvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 单击 控件中的链接按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a link button in a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的列表项时引发事件单击控件。The event is raised when a list item in a control is clicked. 若要启用中的列表项控件以引发事件，属性首先必须设置为值。To enable list items in a control to raise the event, the property first must be set to the value . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 单击列表项时，在显示一条消息页上的控件。When a list item is clicked, a message is displayed in a control on the page. 项目符号列表中的所有链接按钮都引发相同的事件。All the link buttons in the bulleted list raise the same event. 若要确定哪个链接按钮引发事件，检查自变量。To determine which link button raised the event, the argument is examined. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/CS/bulletedlistclickeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/VB/bulletedlistclickeventvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的列表内容的显示模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display mode of the list content in a control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要应用于内容的列表项中的显示行为控件。Use the property to specify the display behavior to apply to the content of list items in a control. 属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|显示为Displayed as| |-----------|------------------| ||文本。Text.| ||超链接。Hyperlinks.| ||链接按钮。Link buttons.| 值，可以将列表内容显示为超链接。The value allows you to display list content as hyperlinks. 单击时，超链接导航到的 URL。When clicked, a hyperlink navigates to a URL. 使用属性指定超链接导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to. 字段可用于显示为链接列表的内容。The field allows you to display list content as links. 使用事件回发到服务器时单击的链接按钮。Use the event to post back to the server when a link button is clicked. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件，并设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property. 一个控件中填充枚举值。A control is populated with the enumeration values. 根据用户从列表框中选择的显示模式列表项内容更改的格式。The format of the list item content changes based on the display mode that the user selects from the list box. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/CS/bulletedlistdisplaymodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/VB/bulletedlistdisplaymodevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置排序 控件中列表项开始编号的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control.

value.span: 排序 控件中列表项开始编号的值。

span.span: The value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定开始编号的列表项中有序值控件。Use the property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control. 分配给的值忽略属性，如果属性设置为， ， ，或值。The value that is assigned to the property is ignored, if the property is set to the , , , or values. 尽管的值属性是一个整数，它不会始终会导致项目符号呈现为数字。Although the value of the property is an integer, it does not always cause a bullet to render as a number. 例如，如果您设置属性设置为`4`并设置属性的值，第一个项目符号数字将呈现为小写字母 d。For example, if you set the property to `4` and set the property to the value , the first bullet number will render as a lowercase d. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件，并设置属性来指定开始编号的列表项中的值控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in the control. 开始编号的列表项更改的值基于用户在文本框中输入的值。The value that starts the numbering of the list items changes based on the value that the user enters in the text box. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListFirstBulletNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListFirstBulletNumber/CS/firstbulletnumbercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListFirstBulletNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListFirstBulletNumber/VB/firstbulletnumbervb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnClick (System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedListEventArgs e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 为 控件引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的列表项时引发事件单击控件。The event is raised when a list item in the control is clicked. 若要启用中的列表项控件以引发事件，必须先设置属性的值。To enable list items in a control to raise the event, you must first set the property to the value . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 单击列表项时，在显示一条消息页上的控件。When a list item is clicked, a message is displayed in a control on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/CS/bulletedlistclickeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/VB/bulletedlistclickeventvb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 重写时方法在派生类中，则一定要调用方法的基类以便注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在内部使用控制项列表中的链接按钮单击时。The method is used internally by the control when a link button within the item list is clicked. 包含页上指定的索引中的被单击的链接按钮`eventArgument`参数，用来初始化属性的对象。The containing page specifies the index of the clicked link button in the `eventArgument` parameter, which is used to initialize the property of a object. 方法将引发通过传递初始化事件对象传递给方法。The method raises a event by passing the initialized object to the method. 方法可以执行之前引发验证控件事件。The method optionally can perform validation before raising the event for the control. 若要验证的一组中的链接按钮时页面上的控件单击时，设置属性设置为`true`并指定的控件中要验证组属性。To validate a group of controls on the page when a link button within the is clicked, set the property to `true` and specify the group of controls to be validated in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员。The method is used primarily by control developers. 方法的呈现的内容写入向客户端使用提供的项对象。The method writes the rendered content of the items to the client using the supplied object. 每个项中的元素表示集合。Each item is represented by an element in the collection. 如果的属性控件为空，则没有内容呈现给。If the property of the control is empty, no content is rendered to the . 中的至少一个列表项是否集合，方法将写入的 HTML 内容控制使用， ，并方法。If there is at least one list item in the collection, the method writes the HTML content for the control using the , , and methods.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中当前选定项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item in a control.
Always returns -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基的类中， ，则属性返回当前选定项的从零开始索引。In the base class, , the property returns a zero-based index of the currently selected item. 默认值为 -1，指示未选定任何内容。The default is -1, which indicates that nothing is selected. 属性不是适用于控件。The property is not applicable to the control. **请注意**使用时`get`访问器属性，它始终返回`-1`。**Note** When you use the `get` accessor for the property, it always returns `-1`. 尝试使用`set`访问器的属性将引发。An attempt to use the `set` accessor for the property raises a . 使用事件数据的类来确定索引中的链接按钮被单击的控件。Use the event data of the class to determine the index of the link button in a control that was clicked. 此属性不在可视化设计器，可绑定，而是在运行时可绑定。This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基的类中， ，则属性将返回对象，表示当前选定的项中控件。In the base class, , the property returns a object that represents the currently selected item in a control. 默认值为 `null`。The default is `null`. 属性不是适用于控件。The property is not applicable to the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用`get`访问器的属性返回的选定的项控件，它始终返回`null`。If you use the `get` accessor for the property to return the selected item for a control, it always returns `null`. 使用事件数据的类来确定索引中的链接按钮被单击。Use the event data of the class to determine the index of the link button in a that was clicked.

summary.span: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，单击 控件中的超链接时在其中显示链接到的网页内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is linked to when a hyperlink in a control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 中的超链接时，在其中加载链接到的网页的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a is clicked.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须以 A 到 Z （不区分大小写） 下, 表中列出的以下划线开头的特殊值除外范围内的字母开头。Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the special values that are listed in the following table, which begin with an underscore. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|呈现的直接框架集父级中的内容。Renders the content in the immediate frame-set parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. 使用属性指定的框架或窗口，其中显示中的超链接时链接到的网页单击控件。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is linked to when a hyperlink in a control is clicked. 将列表项的内容显示为中的超链接控件，将属性的值。To display the content of the list items as hyperlinks in a control, set the property to the value . 然后，设置到 URL 的 Web 页后，可以导航到每个列表项的属性。Then, set the property of each list item to the URL of the Web page to navigate to. 如果未设置属性，浏览器或单击超链接时焦点刷新窗口。If the property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the hyperlink is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性将呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`特性，可以在`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许元素。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议您不要使用属性将另一个窗口作为目标。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件，并设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property. 当用户选择显示模式列表框中，从属性设置为`_blank`要在新的浏览器窗口中显示所链接的页面。When the user selects the display mode from the list box, the property is set to `_blank` to display the linked page in a new browser window. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListDisplaymode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/CS/bulletedlistdisplaymodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListDisplaymode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/VB/bulletedlistdisplaymodevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性继承自类，并不是适用于控件。The property is inherited from the class and is not applicable to the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性是在内部根据设置中的所选的列表项控件。The property is set internally based on the selected list item in the control. 如果您设置属性直接引发异常。If you set the property directly, a exception is thrown. 不能访问的同时的属性控件，可以使用的事件数据类来确定索引中的链接按钮被单击。While you cannot access the property of control, you can use the event data of the class to determine the index of the link button in a that was clicked. 然后，您可以访问属性的控件。You can then access the property of the control.
